The seconde tragedie of Seneca entituled Thyestes faithfully Englished by Iasper Heywood fellowe of Alsolne College in Oxforde Thyestes. English Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D. Heywood, Jasper, 1535-1598.
[112] p.
In Fletestrete in the hous late Thomas Berthelettes, Imprinted at London : Anno. 1560. 26. die Martij.
In verse. Signatures: * [fleuron] A-E. The last two leaves are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
